named-query.name: SchoolClass.getSchoolClassByClassNameAndIdSchool
named-query.query: SELECT sc FROM SchoolClass sc WHERE sc.className = :className AND sc.school.id = :idSchool

named-query.name: SchoolClass.getSupervisingTeacherById
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM SchoolClass sc JOIN sc.teacher t WHERE sc.teacher.id = :idTeacher

named-query.name: SchoolClass.getSchoolClassBySupervisingTeacher
named-query.query: SELECT sc.className FROM SchoolClass sc JOIN sc.teacher t WHERE sc.teacher.id = :idTeacher

named-query.name: SchoolClass.findSchoolClassesBySchoolId
named-query.query: SELECT sc FROM SchoolClass sc WHERE sc.school.id = :idSchool

named-query.name: SchoolClass.isTeacherBelongsToSchool
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Teacher t WHERE t.id = :idTeacher AND t.school.id = :idSchool
